00019 #ifndef SP_MATRIX_H
00020 #define SP_MATRIX_H

00022 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00023 #include "SpSpTuple.h"

00027 namespace Spark
00028 {
00029 
00030 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00032 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 template <unsigned int N, class Real>
00034 class SpMatrix
00035 {
00036 public:
00037 
00038     SpMatrix ();
00039     SpMatrix (bool bZero);
00040     SpMatrix (const SpMatrix& rkM);
00041 
00042     // member access
00043     operator const Real* () const;
00044     operator Real* ();
00045     const Real* operator[] (unsigned int uiRow) const;
00046     Real* operator[] (unsigned int uiRow);
00047     Real operator() (unsigned int uiRow, unsigned int uiCol) const;
00048     Real& operator() (unsigned int uiRow, unsigned int uiCol);
00049 
00050     SpTuple<N,Real> getRow (unsigned int uiRow) const;
00051     void setRow (unsigned int uiRow, const SpTuple<N,Real>& rkV);
00052 
00053     SpTuple<N,Real> getColumn (unsigned int uiCol) const;
00054     void setColumn (unsigned int uiCol, const SpTuple<N,Real>& rkV);
00055 
00056     // assignment
00057     SpMatrix& operator= (const SpMatrix& rkM);
00058 
00059     // comparison
00060     bool operator== (const SpMatrix& rkM) const;
00061     bool operator!= (const SpMatrix& rkM) const;
00062     bool operator<  (const SpMatrix& rkM) const;
00063     bool operator<= (const SpMatrix& rkM) const;
00064     bool operator>  (const SpMatrix& rkM) const;
00065     bool operator>= (const SpMatrix& rkM) const;
00066 
00067     // arithmetic operations
00068     SpMatrix operator+ (const SpMatrix& rkM) const;
00069     SpMatrix operator- (const SpMatrix& rkM) const;
00070     SpMatrix operator* (const SpMatrix& rkM) const;
00071     SpMatrix operator* (Real fScalar) const;
00072     SpMatrix operator/ (Real fScalar) const;
00073     SpMatrix operator- () const;
00074 
00075     // arithmetic updates
00076     SpMatrix& operator+= (const SpMatrix& rkM);
00077     SpMatrix& operator-= (const SpMatrix& rkM);
00078     SpMatrix& operator*= (Real fScalar);
00079     SpMatrix& operator/= (Real fScalar);
00080 
00081     // matrix-vector operations
00082     SpTuple<N,Real> operator* (const SpTuple<N,Real>& rkV) const;  // M * v
00083 
00084 protected:
00085 
00086     // support for comparisons
00087     int compare(const SpMatrix& rkM) const;
00088 
00089     Real m_afValues[N][N];
00090 };
00091 
00092 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00093 
00094 // c * M
00095 template <unsigned int N, class Real>
00096 SpMatrix<N,Real> operator* (Real fScalar, const SpMatrix<N,Real>& rkM);
00097 
00098 // v^T * M
00099 template <unsigned int N, class Real>
00100 SpTuple<N,Real> operator* (const SpTuple<N,Real>& rkV, const SpMatrix<N,Real>& rkM);
00101 
00102 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00104 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00105 template <class Real>
00106 class SpMatrix2 : public SpMatrix<2,Real>
00107 {
00108 public:
00109 
00110     // construction
00111     SpMatrix2 ();
00112     SpMatrix2 (const SpMatrix2& rkM);
00113     SpMatrix2 (const SpMatrix<2,Real>& rkM);
00114     SpMatrix2 (Real fM00, Real fM01, Real fM10, Real fM11);
00115     SpMatrix2 (const Real afEntry[4], bool bRowMajor);
00116     SpMatrix2 (const SpTuple2<Real>& rkU, const SpTuple2<Real>& rkV, bool bColumns);
00117     SpMatrix2 (const SpTuple2<Real>* akV, bool bColumns);
00118 
00119     // create a diagonal matrix
00120     SpMatrix2 (Real fM00, Real fM11);
00121 
00122     // create a rotation matrix (positive angle - counterclockwise)
00123     SpMatrix2 (Real fAngle);
00124 
00125     // assignment
00126     SpMatrix2& operator= (const SpMatrix2& rkM);
00127     SpMatrix2& operator= (const SpMatrix<2,Real>& rkM);
00128 };
00129 
00130 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00132 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00133 template <class Real>
00134 class SpMatrix3 : public SpMatrix<3,Real>
00135 {
00136 public:
00137     // construction
00138     SpMatrix3();
00139 
00140     SpMatrix3(const SpMatrix3& rkM);
00141 
00142     SpMatrix3(const SpMatrix<3,Real>& rkM);
00143 
00144     SpMatrix3(Real fM00, Real fM01, Real fM02,
00145             Real fM10, Real fM11, Real fM12,
00146             Real fM20, Real fM21, Real fM22);
00147 
00148     SpMatrix3 (const Real afEntry[9], bool bRowMajor);
00149 
00150     SpMatrix3 (const SpTuple3<Real>& rkU, const SpTuple3<Real>& rkV,
00151              const SpTuple3<Real>& rkW, bool bColumns);
00152 
00153     SpMatrix3 (const SpTuple3<Real>* akV, bool bColumns);
00154 
00155     // Create rotation matrices (positive angle - counterclockwise).  The
00156     // angle must be in radians, not degrees.
00157     SpMatrix3 (const SpTuple3<Real>& rkAxis, Real fAngle);
00158     void FromAxisAngle (const SpTuple3<Real>& rkAxis, Real fAngle);
00159 
00160     // assignment
00161     SpMatrix3& operator= (const SpMatrix3& rkM);
00162     SpMatrix3& operator= (const SpMatrix<3,Real>& rkM);
00163 };
